title: Healthy Sexuality
content:
Being sexually healthy means that you can express your sexual feelings in ways that are not harmful to yourself or to anyone else. You don't have to take risks with your own feelings and health. As a young person, you can start informing yourself about the facts pertaining to sex. Take off some time to think about your choices related to sexual activity. It could be "No sex" or "Not Yet". It is good to wait before rushing into sexual intercourse.

Let's Talk

Take Action!
